Package danogl.gui

package danogl.gui
GUI and IO classes
Author:
Dan Nirel
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    danogl
    The main package, containing the main class GameManager
    danogl.gui.mouse
    Types related to mouse callbacks functionality
    danogl.gui.rendering
    Visual representations of objects
    danogl.collisions
    Collision handling of GameObjects
    danogl.components
    A few useful components that can be added to a GameObject
    danogl.util
    Small utility classes
  • Class
    Description
    GameGUIComponent
    The class depends on a GameManager it receives in the constructor: it calls GameManager's initializeGame()), update() and render() methods.
    ImageReader
    Used to read images from disk or from within a jar
    MessageHandler
    Implementation of a logging mechanism: showing messages with different levels of emergency and different output methods.
    MsgLevel
    Specifying the different urgency levels available to a message.
    OutputMode
    Specifying the different output methods available to messages.
    Sound
    Represents a sound (sound-effect or music).
    SoundReader
    Class for reading Sounds from the disk or from within a jar
    UserInputListener
    An interface for reading user input in the current frame
    WindowController
    Provides control and info regarding the game.
